bibl.title: Grand Words for Grand Subjects: Bureaucratic and Literary Influences in the Style of the Septuagint.
bibl.note: Aiming for grand effects? - A penchant for the future passive? - Comparison with documentary papyri [pp. 76-78]. - Literary influences. - Conclusion. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
bibl.seg: Jennifer Dines, Grand Words for Grand Subjects: Bureaucratic and Literary Influences in the Style of the Septuagint.
Aiming for grand effects? - A penchant for the future passive? - Comparison with documentary papyri [pp. 76-78]. - Literary influences. - Conclusion. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
